summary: Completed testing of Frozen Account Feature, UI changes (Mobile Number label, Save button placement, 5-minute time intervals, Centurion logo). All backend API tests passed (5/5). Frontend UI verification successful.
critical_code_review_comments: Frozen Account feature implementation is complete - backend returns accountFrozen: true with frozenMessage and frozenDetails for expired trial users without payment method
FrozenAccountOverlay component correctly displays when user logs in with frozen account status
Signup form Mobile Number field shows '(Optional - Not used for marketing)' label as specified
Availability settings Save button is positioned at the top of the time slots panel for better mobile UX
Time slots use 5-minute intervals (05:00, 05:05, 05:10, etc.) as required
Centurion logo appears next to business name in header for Centurion members

frozen_test_user.status: Account frozen - trial expired without payment method

seed_data_creation: Test user 'frozen_test@test.com' was pre-created for frozen account testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Frozen account feature fully tested and working. All UI changes verified. Test users available for future regression testing.

frozen_account_api.notes: Returns accountFrozen: true, frozenMessage, and frozenDetails for expired trial users without payment method

frozen_account_overlay.notes: Displays 'Account Frozen' overlay with card input form, 'Add Card & Reactivate Account' button, and logout option

signup_mobile_label.notes: Mobile Number field shows '(Optional - Not used for marketing)' text

availability_save_button_position.notes: Save Availability button appears at top of time slots panel when date is selected

centurion_logo_in_header.notes: Centurion logo appears next to business name 'JG Body Clinic' for Centurion members

frozen_account_overlay.title: Account Frozen
frozen_account_overlay.message: Your free trial has ended. Please add a payment method to continue using Calendrax.
frozen_account_overlay.reactivation_text: To reactivate your account and regain access to your bookings and customers, please add a valid payment method below.

signup_form.mobile_label: Mobile Number (Optional - Not used for marketing)

availability_settings.quick_actions: Select All, Clear All buttons present

dashboard_centurion.centurion_badge: Present next to business name in header
dashboard_centurion.centurion_card: Shows 'Centurion Member', referral code 'CC001', and stats
